attributes.action: Improve congestion by crushing all vehicles that are untaxed, uninsured and without MOT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Improve congestion by identifying, removing, and crushing all vehicles on the road that do not have valid insurance, are untaxed, and that do not have a valid MOT certificate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
